column2: Mabel Tolkien]] moves her family, from [[King's Heath]] to a house in [[Edgbaston]] next door to the [[Birmingham Oratory]] and the [[Grammar School of St. Philip]]. To save money, Mabel removes the boys from [[King Edward's School]] and enrolls them in St. Philips.
